alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Snowy Range; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 11:52PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Gusty outflow winds will impact portions of east central Carbon and central Albany Counties through 1245 AM MDT... At 1151 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arlington, or 37 miles northwest of Laramie, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Medicine Bow, Rock River, Elk Mountain, Bow River Campground and Arlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Snowy Range; Upper North Platte River Basin
